item.description:
Every 1st Friday at Kudeta

Connecticut Service Appreciation Night!

All STATE, Military, Yale, Teachers, & Hospital Workers
will receive FREE Admission before 11pm.

Join Urban Professionals from all across Connecticut for the #1 Urban Upscale Venue in Connecticut. Each week the best DJ's from the Tri-State will be at Kudeta downtown New Haven to bring you the best in entertainment and nightlife.

Every 1st Friday - CT Service Industry Appreciation Night!
The Bronx Bomber! DJ KOOL MIKE SKI 88.7 WNHU FM
(Top 40, 80's, Hip Hop, Pop, Latin)

This event is 25+ - STRICT DRESS CODE ENFORCED
WE RESERVE THE RIGHT TO REFUSE ADMISSION

Doors open at 9pm - Dancing 10pm-2am
MUST SHOW SERVICE ID/CARD TO RECEIVE FREE ADMISSION BEFORE 11pm.
For Reduced Admission Guestlist text "Kimora" to 203.444.2509
General Admission $10

For VIP - Birthdays - Bottle Service Contact/Text 203.444.2509

Parking located directly above Kudeta in Temple St./Crown St. Garage
item.name: Connecticut Service Industry Nights at Kudeta -
